title: UPDATE: Was This Bert Show Member Taken Advantage Of After Being Abandoned With Her Friends' Kids?
description:
Is it illegal to leave kids unattended, even if they aren't yours? We're sure Keity wondered the answer to this same question this past Saturday when she was left with her best friend's kids.
